column2: Spreadsheets are updated by Wednesday of each week.
Displayed are Enterococcus counts.  The maximum daily limit is 104 colonies/100 mL
Typically, MDC declares a swimming advisory for the following day if at least one site exceeds 104 colonies/100 mL
or the 5-day running geometric mean for all locations combined exceeds 35 colonies/100 mL
Daily rainfall totals from Logan Airport, National Weather Service raingauge
All results are in colonies/100 mL
Questions?  Contact Kelly Coughlin, Environmental Quality Dept. 617-788-4717
